title: Susie Wiles tells Vanity Fair that Trump has 'alcoholic's personality'
shortDescription: Trump's chief of staff and one of his closest aides offered candid remarks in Vanity Fair but now calls it a "hit piece."

title: Donald Trump Jr. is engaged to Bettina Anderson. See them together
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's eldest son is engaged. See Donald Trump Jr. and Florida socialite Bettina Anderson together.

title: Here's everything President Trump said about Rob Reiner
shortDescription: President Donald Trump received bipartisan condemnation after delivering sharp criticism of Rob Reiner after his death.

title: Trump's $300 million White House ballroom makeover faces day in court
shortDescription: A US judge on Tuesday is holding a hearing on a lawsuit accusing the Trump administration of launching the ballroom project without legal approval.

title: Trump faces criticism over Reiner comments
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is facing criticism from both sides of the aisle over his Rob Reiner comments.

title: Donald Trump Jr. is engaged to Bettina Anderson, Florida socialite
shortDescription: Persident Donald Trump's youngest son, Don. Jr., is engaged to Palm Beach socialite Bettina Anderson. It comes a year after they were first spotted.

title: Why GOP lawmaker says her bill is a better fix for health care costs
shortDescription: U.S. Rep. Mariannette Miller-Meeks is the lead sponsor on a GOP bill aimed at making health care more affordable, without extending ACA subsidies.

title: Trump sues BBC over Jan. 6 video edit
shortDescription: President Trump filed a $10 billion lawsuit against BBC for editing his Jan. 6 speech in a documentary segment.

title: Trump's MAGA base show signs of discontent in new poll
shortDescription: In the latest NBC News poll, enthusiasm for the president among Republicans and MAGA has dropped since April. Here's by how much.

title: Rob Reiner, Brown shooting show Trump's limits as consoler-in-chief
shortDescription: In times of national tragedy and grief, Donald Trump often chooses not to perform the traditional presidential role of comforting the nation.

title: Trump doubles down on bashing Rob Reiner after film director's death
shortDescription: Trump expressed no regret nor offered an apology for comments about the late Rob Reiner, which even some Republican supporters have since denounced.

title: Trump sues BBC for $10B over edited Jan. 6 video
shortDescription: The president filed a defamation lawsuit against the British broadcaster after the company published a video critics say was unfairly edited.

title: Trump calls Rob Reiner a 'deranged person'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump doubled down on his comments about Rob Reiner, calling the late director a "deranged person."

title: Trump moves to classify fentanyl as a weapon of mass destruction
shortDescription: The executive order comes as the president has signed off on unprecedented airstrikes on suspected drug-carrying boats in the Caribbean.

title: 'Baby ... make the trees green.' Trump asks Melania after 2018 Christmas
shortDescription: President Trump and first lady Melania spoke at a Christmas reception on Dec. 14, 2025. Trump brought up past red Christmas trees, which went viral.

title: Conservatives condemn Trump's 'vile' Rob Reiner comments
shortDescription: "This is inappropriate and disrespectful discourse about a man who was just brutally murdered," GOP Rep. Thomas Massie said of Trump's comments.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene blasts Trump post about Rob Reiner's death
shortDescription: 'This is a family tragedy, not about politics or political enemies,' Greene, a Republican and long-time Trump ally, wrote in a separate post on X.

title: Far-right candidate Jose Antonio Kast wins Chile's election
shortDescription: Chilean voters elected the most right-wing president in 35 years of democracy on Sunday, with official results showing arch-conservative Jose Antonio Kast with a thumping victory and his rival quickly conceding defeat.
